page.title: 18 CARNIVALS AND FETES
page.content:
COLEBROOK CARNIVAL First came the procession led by a band.Then came the majorettes.Behind them was a float with the carnival queen and her attendants.Then other floats,some with children.The last one was a float of Alice In Wonderland.It stopped at Peacock Meadow.There were lots of stalls and games and a hall of mirrors.There was also a judo display, mini motorbikes and a bouncy castle.
BORINGDON SCHOOL WILD WEST FETE. The fete was opened by the Boy's Brigade Band.Next was the judging of the wild west fancy dress.There were many stalls selling toys,cakes,plants, babyware,jewelery and white elephant. There were swing boats,horse rides and crockery smashing.There was a wild west knock out for the parents.
